data.wordByWord: صٓ ۚ [Saad] وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ [By the Quran] ذِى [full (of) reminder] ٱلذِّكْرِ [full (of) reminder]

data.textUthmani: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى عِزَّةٍ وَشِقَاقٍ
data.wordByWord: بَلِ [Nay] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] كَفَرُوا۟ [disbelieve] فِى [(are) in] عِزَّةٍۢ [self-glory] وَشِقَاقٍۢ [and opposition]

data.textUthmani: كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن قَرْنٍ فَنَادَوا۟ وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٍ
data.wordByWord: كَمْ [How many] أَهْلَكْنَا [We destroyed] مِن [before them] قَبْلِهِم [before them] مِّن [of] قَرْنٍۢ [a generation] فَنَادَوا۟ [then they called out] وَّلَاتَ [when there (was) no longer] حِينَ [time] مَنَاصٍۢ [(for) escape]
data.transliteration: Kam ahlakna min qablihim min qarninfanadaw walata heena manas

data.textUthmani: وَعَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ ۖ وَقَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا سَـٰحِرٌ كَذَّابٌ
data.wordByWord: وَعَجِبُوٓا۟ [And they wonder] أَن [that] جَآءَهُم [has come to them] مُّنذِرٌۭ [a warner] مِّنْهُمْ ۖ [from themselves] وَقَالَ [And said] ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ [the disbelievers] هَـٰذَا [This] سَـٰحِرٌۭ [(is) a magician] كَذَّابٌ [a liar]
data.transliteration: WaAAajiboo an jaahum munthirunminhum waqala alkafiroona hatha sahirunkaththab

data.textUthmani: أَجَعَلَ ٱلْـَٔالِهَةَ إِلَـٰهًا وَٰحِدًا ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ عُجَابٌ
data.wordByWord: أَجَعَلَ [Has he made] ٱلْـَٔالِهَةَ [the gods] إِلَـٰهًۭا [(into) one god] وَٰحِدًا ۖ [(into) one god] إِنَّ [Indeed] هَـٰذَا [this] لَشَىْءٌ [(is) certainly a thing] عُجَابٌۭ [curious]
data.transliteration: AjaAAala al-alihata ilahan wahidaninna hatha lashay-on AAujab

data.textUthmani: وَٱنطَلَقَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱمْشُوا۟ وَٱصْبِرُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ يُرَادُ
data.wordByWord: وَٱنطَلَقَ [And went forth] ٱلْمَلَأُ [the chiefs] مِنْهُمْ [among them] أَنِ [that] ٱمْشُوا۟ [Continue] وَٱصْبِرُوا۟ [and be patient] عَلَىٰٓ [over] ءَالِهَتِكُمْ ۖ [your gods] إِنَّ [Indeed] هَـٰذَا [this] لَشَىْءٌۭ [(is) certainly a thing] يُرَادُ [intended]
data.transliteration: Wantalaqa almalao minhum aniimshoo wasbiroo AAala alihatikuminna hatha lashay-on yurad

data.textUthmani: مَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَـٰذَا فِى ٱلْمِلَّةِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخْتِلَـٰقٌ
data.wordByWord: مَا [Not] سَمِعْنَا [we heard] بِهَـٰذَا [of this] فِى [in] ٱلْمِلَّةِ [the religion] ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ [the last] إِنْ [Not] هَـٰذَآ [(is) this] إِلَّا [but] ٱخْتِلَـٰقٌ [a fabrication]
data.transliteration: Ma samiAAna bihatha feealmillati al-akhirati in hatha illa ikhtilaq

data.textUthmani: أَءُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلذِّكْرُ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّ مِّن ذِكْرِى ۖ بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِ
data.wordByWord: أَءُنزِلَ [Has been revealed] عَلَيْهِ [to him] ٱلذِّكْرُ [the Message] مِنۢ [from] بَيْنِنَا ۚ [among us] بَلْ [Nay] هُمْ [They] فِى [(are) in] شَكٍّۢ [doubt] مِّن [about] ذِكْرِى ۖ [My Message] بَل [Nay] لَّمَّا [not yet] يَذُوقُوا۟ [they have tasted] عَذَابِ [My punishment]
data.transliteration: Aonzila AAalayhi aththikru minbaynina bal hum fee shakkin min thikree bal lammayathooqoo AAathab

data.textUthmani: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْوَهَّابِ
data.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] عِندَهُمْ [have they] خَزَآئِنُ [(the) treasures] رَحْمَةِ [(of the) Mercy] رَبِّكَ [(of) your Lord] ٱلْعَزِيزِ [the All-Mighty] ٱلْوَهَّابِ [the Bestower]
data.transliteration: Am AAindahum khaza-inu rahmatirabbika alAAazeezi alwahhab

data.textUthmani: أَمْ لَهُم مُّلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَلْيَرْتَقُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَسْبَـٰبِ
data.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] لَهُم [for them] مُّلْكُ [(is the) dominion] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [(of) the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضِ [and the earth] وَمَا [and whatever] بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ [(is) between them] فَلْيَرْتَقُوا۟ [Then let them ascend] فِى [by] ٱلْأَسْبَـٰبِ [the means]
data.transliteration: Am lahum mulku assamawatiwal-ardi wama baynahuma falyartaqoofee al-asbab

data.textUthmani: جُندٌ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهْزُومٌ مِّنَ ٱلْأَحْزَابِ
data.wordByWord: جُندٌۭ [Soldiers ] مَّا [there] هُنَالِكَ [there] مَهْزُومٌۭ [(they will be) defeated] مِّنَ [among] ٱلْأَحْزَابِ [the companies]

data.textUthmani: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ ذُو ٱلْأَوْتَادِ
data.wordByWord: كَذَّبَتْ [Denied] قَبْلَهُمْ [before them] قَوْمُ [(the) people] نُوحٍۢ [(of) Nuh] وَعَادٌۭ [and Aad] وَفِرْعَوْنُ [and Firaun] ذُو [(the) owner] ٱلْأَوْتَادِ [(of) the stakes]
data.transliteration: Kaththabat qablahum qawmu noohinwaAAadun wafirAAawnu thoo al-awtad

data.textUthmani: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ لْـَٔيْكَةِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ
data.wordByWord: وَثَمُودُ [And Thamud] وَقَوْمُ [and (the) people] لُوطٍۢ [(of) Lut] وَأَصْحَـٰبُ [and (the) companions] لْـَٔيْكَةِ ۚ [(of) the wood] أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ [Those] ٱلْأَحْزَابُ [(were) the companies]
data.transliteration: Wathamoodu waqawmu lootin waas-habual-aykati ola-ika al-ahzab

data.textUthmani: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ
data.wordByWord: إِن [Not] كُلٌّ [all (of them)] إِلَّا [but] كَذَّبَ [denied] ٱلرُّسُلَ [the Messengers] فَحَقَّ [so (was) just] عِقَابِ [My penalty]
data.transliteration: In kullun illa kaththaba arrusulafahaqqa AAiqab

data.textUthmani: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٍ
data.wordByWord: وَمَا [And not] يَنظُرُ [await] هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ [these] إِلَّا [but] صَيْحَةًۭ [a shout] وَٰحِدَةًۭ [one] مَّا [not] لَهَا [for it] مِن [any] فَوَاقٍۢ [delay]
data.transliteration: Wama yanthuru haola-iilla sayhatan wahidatan ma lahamin fawaq

data.textUthmani: وَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ
data.wordByWord: وَقَالُوا۟ [And they say] رَبَّنَا [Our Lord] عَجِّل [Hasten] لَّنَا [for us] قِطَّنَا [our share] قَبْلَ [before] يَوْمِ [(the) Day] ٱلْحِسَابِ [(of) the Account]
data.transliteration: Waqaloo rabbana AAajjil lanaqittana qabla yawmi alhisab
